name: penciller
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an artist who does the first stage of the drawings for a comic , graphic novel, or animation (= a book or film whose story is told in pictures), either in pencil or on a computer: Pencillers draw the panels, illustrating the story. I would say I had more interaction with inkers than with pencillers. Compare
colourist (ARTIST)
inker
letterer
More examplesFewer examplesThe penciller creates a deceptively simplistic art style for the series.Then he teamed up with a penciller, inker, and letterer to make "Adventures" a reality.A penciller/inker is as important to comics as a cinematographer is to film.
